{"name": "L.I.F.T Food Pantry", "alternate_name": "", "description": "* **2025 Distribution:**
	* August 1
	* August 15
	* September 5
	* September 19
	* October 3
	* October 17
	* October 31
	* November 21
* Call the Office Phone (+15167040175) or Louise (+16466647378) for any questions regarding the distribution.
* Must register to Plentiful to have Plentiful ID that is needed to be scanned upon receiving food.", "email": "", "url": null, "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "255 McKibbin Street", "address_2": "Suite 032", "city": "Brooklyn", "state_province": "NY", "postal_code": "11206", "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": 40.7058871, "longitude": -73.9374341}, "phones": [{"number": "(646) 664-7378", "type": "voice"}], "regular_schedule": [{"weekday": "Friday", "opens_at": "16:00", "closes_at": "18:00"}, {"weekday": "Friday", "opens_at": "16:00", "closes_at": "18:00"}], "service_attributes": [{"attribute_key": "OFFERING", "attribute_value": "Clients can visit: Once a month"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Schedule appointment through PLENTIFUL app"}, {"attribute_key": "INFO", "attribute_value": "No ID is required."}]}
